allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive health and fitness AI agent with specialized tools

Built Elicia AI as an expert health and fitness coach with 13 specialized tools:

Fitness Calculators:
- BMI calculator with health assessment
- TDEE calculator for daily calorie needs  
- Macronutrient calculator (protein/carbs/fat distribution)
- One rep max calculator for strength training
- Body fat percentage estimator (Navy method)
- Heart rate training zones
- Hydration recommendations

Workout Tools:
- Personalized workout plan generator
- Exercise recommendations by muscle group
- Progressive overload calculator

Nutrition Tools:
- Meal plan generator (3-6 meals/day)
- Nutrition database for common foods
- Healthy food alternatives

Features:
- OpenAI function calling integration for automatic tool selection
- Chainlit web UI with streaming responses
- Conversation memory and context awareness
- Professional health coach system prompt
- Evidence-based recommendations with safety guidelines
- CLI version (agent.py) and web version (chainlit_app.py)

Tech Stack:
- Python 3.11
- OpenAI GPT-4o-mini
- Chainlit for UI
- Custom tool registry system
